Text: Is this just the subtitles or the complete file? If just the subtitles how does a novice like me compile it with video?

It's not even 300Kbit...so it obviously is ONLY the sub! 
You can add it to your movie by just adding it in the player, vlc for example. 
Thanks for uploading the sub...hope it's good ;=)
Thanks, but when I said novice, I meant dufus. I have tried copying it into the same folder etc but no go. Not sure what you mean by 'just adding it in the player'. Thanks for being patient.
OOOOooooMG!  Thank you SO much!  I had started to edit the shytie one and gave up.  This works perfectly.  I can finally watch this film!  LOL
